definition: entrance door/to enter a door/introduction (to a subject)
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: For example, the charting widget has a tests directory that contains code to get you started.
sentences.chinese: 例如，图表小部件的测试目录包含入门代码。

sentences.english: Everyone learns the rudiments of arithmetic in elementary school.
sentences.chinese: 在小学，每个人都学习入门算术。

sentences.english: This is a human-computer game players, a character interface, the entry-level.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个人机对战游戏，字符界面，入门级别。

sentences.english: This book is an introduction to English grammar.
sentences.chinese: 本书是英文文法的入门书。

sentences.english: The first two chapters provide introductory and background material.
sentences.chinese: 头两篇提供入门性的和背景性的材料。

sentences.english: They are usually free although some may charge a small entrance fee.
sentences.chinese: 这些俱乐部通常是免费的，少部分会收取少量入门费。

sentences.english: Most beginning bows come with the bowstring so we won't get into bowstrings.
sentences.chinese: 大多入门级弓带弓弦所以这里我们不涉及弓弦。
非常适用于初学入门者。

sentences.english: It is a ideal rudimental form of chinese Wushu.
sentences.chinese: 是学习中国武术理想入门拳法。

sentences.english: One of our themes is to lower the barriers to entry.
sentences.chinese: 我们有一个主旨，就是降低入门的门坎。

sentences.english: It also provides some entry-level information for implementing globalization.
sentences.chinese: 本文还提供了一些实现全球化的入门知识。

sentences.english: Total War is simultaneously dignified history and entry-level pop.
sentences.chinese: 全战是严肃的历史，以及大众接受的入门级别。

sentences.english: This tutorial is specificly for those starting from zero.
sentences.chinese: 这篇入门就是为了从零开始的人而写的。

sentences.english: Suitable for beginners, prawns can skip, welcome criticism and.
sentences.chinese: 适合入门者，大虾可略过，欢迎批评指正。

sentences.english: All right, glasses, you ready for Hacking 101?
sentences.chinese: 好了，小眼镜，黑客入门教程准备好没？

definition: to set out/to set in motion/the start (of some activity)
to obtain/to master/overhand (serve etc)/seat of honor
doorstep/sill/threshold/fig. knack or trick (esp. scheme to get sth cheaper)
to begin/to set one's hand to
crash (course)/accelerated (process)/quick (fix)/instant (success)/to achieve in a short time
from the main room, enter the inner chamber (idiom)/to go to the next level/to attain a higher level
